law.history: Repealed 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 20, effective August 1, 2008. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 1, effective July 1, 2007. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 1, effective July 1, 2004. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 547, sec. 5, effective January 1, 2001. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1994; and ch. 54, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 390, sec. 1, effective June 1, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 233, sec. 26, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 40, Part 1, sec. 2. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 5, Art. 1, sec. 4.
